attributes.action: stop basing taxation and economical needs of the people on the "average wage"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those many of us who earn less than £15000 are not taken into consideration when it comes to local taxation and econimic needs as everything seems to be based on the average wage of £28000, that is management money and we the workers are on far less and are considered less.
